title: Windy
description: Windy Gale wants to forget the very thing that makes her unique — the ability to control the wind. But forgetting becomes difficult when Windy starts having dreams of her father. To make matters worse, Windy discovers that her boyfriend has a secret that will change her world forever.  If Windy wants to survive and keep the ones she cares about alive, she’ll have to accept her past by embracing her powers.  “ ... why would you think that something is impossible when you know anything is actually possible?”
author: A.  Kennedy
